content:
/>
X.ii.1.A.1.a
.
Binding Determinations
Under
38 CFR 3.104
a decision of a Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) rating agency is binding on all VA field offices as to the conclusions based on the evidence on file at the time VA issues notification in accordance with
38 U.S.C. 5104
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A - Finality of Decisions
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section A
